ImageRecord.description: URLs of images that showcase the item, local_name refers to the downloaded and cached file, if it exists, it's not mandatory to be downloaded.  When refreshing, is expected to be downloaded replacing if existed locally.

ModelRecord.description: Models that should be present to the user, no matter if they are popular or not. Will be filtered out according to the absence of workers.

StyleRecord.description: Styles that should be present, no matter if they are popular or not.  Will be filtered out according to the absence of workers.

ForbiddenArray.description: In case of need to ban models or styles, according to disputes, the model expects a name, and for styles, the ID is referred

DateRecord.description: Aimed to be a date in YYYY-MM-DD format to validate if there is need of doing changes to the default ones.
